I'm trying to figure out why I have on pilots launching my ship. They are there at the beginning, but after launch they disappear.

Why do they disappear and how do I prevent it?

Screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/sGIm8J7.jpg

never happened to me before and i think it isn't supposed to happen either. If you don't have the steamversion try a new clean install, might be a bit "overkill" but it should fix your problem 100% ^^ Did this happened before or is this your first time launching?

Not my first time. It seems to become popular with the new patch. I have the steam version as it was on sale last week. Am I able to do a clean install?

Not my first time. It seems to become popular with the new patch. I have the steam version as it was on sale last week. Am I able to do a clean install?

- Yes, just right-click on KSP in your Steam Library and select 'delete local content.'

- Then, go to your Steam download directory (default is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program - on a windows system IIRC), and delete any remaining contents (this will delete any saves you have).

- Then, simply re-install KSP
